spec_data.Name: ruby-romkan
spec_data.Description:
Ruby/Romkan is a Romaji <-> Kana conversion library for Ruby. It can
convert a Japanese Romaji string to a Japanese Kana string or vice
versa.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 09:54:37 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Romaji <-> Kana conversion library for Ruby
